meanings.definition: A statement or event that serves as evidence or proof of something.
meanings.sent1: The video footage was a powerful testimonial of the crime committed.
meanings.sent2: The success of the project was a glowing testimonial to their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The testimonial of the missing cookie jar led to a hilarious discovery.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a testimonial of the joy she felt inside.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow after the storm was a beautiful testimonial of hope.
